articles.description: Taylor Fritz produced a strong serving performance to overcome countryman Maxime Cressy 6-2, 6-7(4), 7-6(4) and capture his third ATP Tour title and second in Eastbourne.
articles.content:
Taylor Fritzs serve came to the party when it mattered in the final of the Rothesay International on Saturday.
The American produced a near faultless display on delivery as he overcome countryman Ma… [+1409 chars]

articles.title: Stefanos Tsitsipas Edges Roberto Bautista Agut For Maiden Grass Crown - ATP Tour
articles.description: Stefanos Tsitsipas showed few signs of nerves in his maiden grass-court final on Saturday at the Mallorca Championships, where the second seed downed Roberto Bautista Agut to claim his maiden tour-level title on the surface.
articles.content: Stefanos Tsitsipas showed few signs of nerves in his maiden ATP Tour grass-court final on Saturday at the Mallorca Championships, where the second seed downed Roberto Bautista Agut to claim his first… [+2990 chars]
